docs.text: 🌟 服务简介 Chroma 是一个开源的 AI 应用数据库。Chroma 让 LLM 能够轻松构建 LLM 应用，因为它允许 LLM 插入知识、事实和技能。 💰 计费说明 Chroma社区版在计算巢部署的费用主要涉及： 所选vCPU与内存规格 系统盘类型及容量 公网带宽 🚀 部署流程 访问计算巢ChromaDB社区版 部署链接 ，按提示填写部署参数： 参数填写完成后可以看到对应询价明细，确认参数后点击 下一步：确认订单 。 确认订单完成后同意服务协议并点击 立即创建 进入部署阶段。 等待部署完成后进入服务实例详情页。 点击服务地址并使用ChromaDB社区版。 📚 使用指南 更多用法请参考ChromaDB 官网文档 。
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Chroma 是一个开源的 AI 应用数据库。Chroma 让 LLM 能够轻松构建 LLM 应用，因为它允许 LLM 插入知识、事实和技能。
docs.title: 🌟 服务简介

docs.text: Chroma社区版在计算巢部署的费用主要涉及： 所选vCPU与内存规格 系统盘类型及容量 公网带宽
docs.title: 💰 计费说明

docs.text: 访问计算巢ChromaDB社区版 部署链接 ，按提示填写部署参数： 参数填写完成后可以看到对应询价明细，确认参数后点击 下一步：确认订单 。 确认订单完成后同意服务协议并点击 立即创建 进入部署阶段。 等待部署完成后进入服务实例详情页。 点击服务地址并使用ChromaDB社区版。
docs.title: 🚀 部署流程

docs.text: 更多用法请参考ChromaDB 官网文档 。
docs.title: 📚 使用指南

docs.text: 🌟Service Introduction Chroma is an open source AI application database. Chroma makes it easy for LLM to build LLM applications because it allows LLM to insert knowledge, facts, and skills. 💰Billing Description The cost of deploying Chroma Community Edition in Compute Nest mainly involves: -Selected vCPU and memory specifications -System disk type and capacity -public network bandwidth 🚀Deployment Process Visit the Computing Nest ChromaDB Community Edition Deployment Link and fill in the deployment parameters as prompted: After completing the parameters, you can see the corresponding RFQ details. After confirming the parameters, click Next: Confirm Order . Confirm that the order is complete and agree to the service agreement and click Create Now to enter the deployment phase. Wait for the deployment to complete and enter the service instance details page. Click on the service address and use the ChromaDB Community Edition. 📚Guidelines for use For more use, please refer to the ChromaDB official website document .
docs.title: Index en

docs.text: Chroma is an open source AI application database. Chroma makes it easy for LLM to build LLM applications because it allows LLM to insert knowledge, facts, and skills.
docs.title: 🌟Service Introduction

docs.text: The cost of deploying Chroma Community Edition in Compute Nest mainly involves: -Selected vCPU and memory specifications -System disk type and capacity -public network bandwidth
docs.title: 💰Billing Description

docs.text: Visit the Computing Nest ChromaDB Community Edition Deployment Link and fill in the deployment parameters as prompted: After completing the parameters, you can see the corresponding RFQ details. After confirming the parameters, click Next: Confirm Order . Confirm that the order is complete and agree to the service agreement and click Create Now to enter the deployment phase. Wait for the deployment to complete and enter the service instance details page. Click on the service address and use the ChromaDB Community Edition.
